name: US Post Office
materials: Inkjet Printer Cartridges; Cables & Connectors; Cell Phones; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; DVD Players/Blu-Ray Players/DVRs; Electronics; Laptop Computers; MP3 Players; Computer Peripherals; Portable Media Players; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; VCRs; Video Game Systems; Blu-Ray Players; Digital Converter Boxes; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: Free, postage-paid Mail Back envelopes can be found on display in the lobby. There is no limit to the number of envelopes customers may take. The contents of the envelope must weigh less than 13 ounces and the envelope must be able to seal completely. For more details visitMaxBack."
